name: Elementum Sextum
description:
Carbon peak and carbon neutral could be one of the most frequently discussed topics nowadays. China hopes to reach a carbon peak by 2030, carbon neutral by 2050. Through this game, we try to make people realize the importance of carbon neutrality by showing the impact of carbon peaks and carbon-neutral on the environment and climate. 

Sesto Elemento is a simulation game with strategy. In the game, the player has an eco-bottle with a small Marine ecosystem. The player plays as a natural environment regulator, needs to adjust the environment in the ecological bottle, through the consumption of points to make decisions, accelerate the growth of various plants and animals, make the environment carbon-neutral, become more habitable. 

The climate and weather in the eco-bottle affect the environment. The extreme climate will affect the ecology, and worse ecology will make the climate even worse. By maintaining a good ecological environment, you can create a more beautiful ecological bottle.
